description: John Terry will make his last appearance at Stamford Bridge in a Chelsea shirt in Sunday’s Premier League game against Sunderland.
title: 'I was worried he would join Man Utd': the inside story of John Terry and Chelsea

author: FourFourTwo
description: Antonio Conte has backed Chelsea great John Terry to make the move into management.
title: Conte: Chelsea captain Terry can be a good manager

author: FourFourTwo
description: John Terry waves goodbye to fans at Stamford Bridge on Sunday as his Chelsea career nears its end.
title: Terry describes 'toughest few weeks' in final Chelsea programme notes

author: FourFourTwo
description: John Terry has been compared to Paolo Maldini and Francesco Totti by Antonio Conte, and the Chelsea boss wants him to keep playing.
title: Conte backs Terry to play on

author: FourFourTwo
description: The curtain on John Terry's Stamford Bridge career came down on Sunday and he made an emotional early exit in his final home appearance.
title: Terry receives guard of honour after 26 minutes as he bids emotional early exit
